AC-2: Logo/brand name visible (üêæ La Pandilla Perfecta)

tasks.title: Style Header component (desktop + mobile)
tasks.description: Apply Tailwind classes for fixed positioning, layout, colors, responsive breakpoints, and mobile menu slide-in animation.
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: Header is fixed at top (fixed top-0 z-50)
AC-2: White background with shadow
AC-3: Logo and nav layout (flexbox, space-between)
AC-4: Desktop nav horizontal, mobile hamburger visible
AC-5: Mobile menu slides in from right with animation
AC-6: Hover states on links (primary green color)
GATE: Looks correct on mobile (375px) and desktop (1024px+)

tasks.title: Add mobile menu JavaScript
tasks.description: Add minimal client-side script to toggle mobile menu open/close and auto-close on link click or resize to desktop.
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: Hamburger button opens mobile menu (adds class)
AC-2: Close button closes mobile menu (removes class)
AC-3: Clicking nav link closes menu and scrolls to section
AC-4: Resizing to desktop auto-closes menu
GATE: No console errors, menu toggles correctly

tasks.title: Integrate Header into BaseLayout and add smooth scroll
tasks.description: Import Header in BaseLayout.astro and add CSS smooth scroll behavior to global.css.
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: Header appears at top of all pages
AC-2: Smooth scroll behavior enabled (scroll-behavior: smooth)
AC-3: Nav links scroll to correct sections
AC-4: Logo click scrolls to top
AC-5: Header does not overlap page content (add padding-top to body/main)
GATE: Build succeeds, all nav links work correctly
